title: Donkey Kong Country: Boss Blitz (1.5)
tooltip: Transforms the game into a boss rush mode with all 7 bosses{0}Only recommended for hardcore players!

title: Donkey Kong Country: Expert Edition
tooltip: Removes the DK Barrels, Star Barrels, and Warp Barrels to make the game more challenging{0}Only recommended for hardcore players!

title: Donkey Kong Country: German 60Hz
tooltip: Forces the game into the German language with typo fixes included
